page.title: 10ALMSHOUSES - INHABITANTS
page.content:
There is no connection between the people living there now and the original owners. It does help to be connected with the church if you apply for one of the almshouses. { Name Age No. Of No. Yrs { Children In House Helen Welsh 70 D=3 S=0 2 years Ruth O'Neil U Unknown 6 months Gertrude Young 85 D=2 S=1 2 years Annie Walker 89 D=0 S=0 12 years Ellen Guest U Unknown 40 years
Key: D=Daughter, S=Son, U=Unknown
{SERVICES:}A district nurse visits daily. Meals are delivered daily which are prepared by the Social Services Dept. Church groups maintain the grounds & the trustees are responsible for the internal decor and general maintenance. They can keep pets.
